title: MTBF_Build_v.0.41.zip
description: Hard-core first-person DH bike simulator. MTBFreeride - is a free ride! You can ride anywhere. No fixed track or checkpoints. Extreme jumps, insane downhill ride, amasing drops or relaxing cross country journey? You can ride as you like. Complex Bike behavior Full suspension bike simulation powered by NVIDIA PhysX. Key features(v.0.3) (aviable to download) Enveronment: Wild forest, big scarps and sharp crags. Complex bike controls. Hard. Ragdoll biker. Replay saving. You can do ride with your previous ride. Epic crashes. You can get off the bike and go on foot. Explore the world safely! MTBFreeride will never have Third-person view, Minigun, Nitro, Arcade Mode ect. Key features(v.0.4) (coming soon) OFFLINE MULTIPLAYER* *Offline multiplayer??? WTF? Ok, you can save your ride to replay file and upload to MTBF server. Now any player can dowload your ride and play with you!
